description: Create Compute Savings Plans, EC2 Instance Savings Plans, or EC2 Reserved Instances commitments that you want to model in a Bill Scenario.

parameters.name: billScenarioId
parameters.description: The ID of the Bill Scenario for which you want to create the modeled commitment.

parameters.name: commitmentModifications
parameters.description: List of commitments that you want to model in the Bill Scenario. (dict) --- Represents an entry object in the batch operation to create bill scenario commitment modifications. A unique identifier for this entry in the batch operation. This can be any valid string. This key is useful to identify errors associated with any commitment entry as any error is returned with this key. group (string) --- An optional group identifier for the commitment modification. The Amazon Web Services account ID to which this commitment will be applied to. The specific commitment action to be taken (e.g., adding a Reserved Instance or Savings Plan). addReservedInstanceAction (dict) --- Action to add a Reserved Instance to the scenario. reservedInstancesOfferingId (string) --- The ID of the Reserved Instance offering to add. For more information, see DescribeReservedInstancesOfferings. instanceCount (integer) --- The number of instances to add for this Reserved Instance offering. addSavingsPlanAction (dict) --- Action to add a Savings Plan to the scenario. savingsPlanOfferingId (string) --- The ID of the Savings Plan offering to add. For more information, see DescribeSavingsPlansOfferings. commitment (float) --- The hourly commitment, in the same currency of the savingsPlanOfferingId. This is a value between 0.001 and 1 million. You cannot specify more than five digits after the decimal point. negateReservedInstanceAction (dict) --- Action to remove a Reserved Instance from the scenario. reservedInstancesId (string) --- The ID of the Reserved Instance to remove. negateSavingsPlanAction (dict) --- Action to remove a Savings Plan from the scenario. savingsPlanId (string) --- The ID of the Savings Plan to remove.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: A unique identifier for this entry in the batch operation. This can be any valid string. This key is useful to identify errors associated with any commitment entry as any error is returned with this key.

nested_params.name: group
nested_params.description: An optional group identifier for the commitment modification.

nested_params.name: usageAccountId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID to which this commitment will be applied to.

nested_params.name: commitmentAction
nested_params.description: The specific commitment action to be taken (e.g., adding a Reserved Instance or Savings Plan).

nested_params.name: addReservedInstanceAction
nested_params.description: Action to add a Reserved Instance to the scenario.

nested_params.name: reservedInstancesOfferingId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Reserved Instance offering to add. For more information, see DescribeReservedInstancesOfferings.

nested_params.name: instanceCount
nested_params.description: The number of instances to add for this Reserved Instance offering.

nested_params.name: addSavingsPlanAction
nested_params.description: Action to add a Savings Plan to the scenario.

nested_params.name: savingsPlanOfferingId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Savings Plan offering to add. For more information, see DescribeSavingsPlansOfferings.

nested_params.name: commitment
nested_params.description: The hourly commitment, in the same currency of the savingsPlanOfferingId. This is a value between 0.001 and 1 million. You cannot specify more than five digits after the decimal point.

nested_params.name: negateReservedInstanceAction
nested_params.description: Action to remove a Reserved Instance from the scenario.

nested_params.name: reservedInstancesId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Reserved Instance to remove.

nested_params.name: negateSavingsPlanAction
nested_params.description: Action to remove a Savings Plan from the scenario.

nested_params.name: savingsPlanId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Savings Plan to remove.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: Returns the list of successful commitment line items that were created for the Bill Scenario.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the successfully created entry. This can be any valid string. This key is useful to identify errors associated with any commitment entry as any error is returned with this key.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier assigned to the created commitment modification.

nested_items.name: group
nested_items.description: The group identifier for the created commitment modification.

nested_items.name: usageAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the created commitment modification.

nested_items.name: commitmentAction
nested_items.description: The specific commitment action that was taken.

nested_items.name: addReservedInstanceAction
nested_items.description: Action to add a Reserved Instance to the scenario.

nested_items.name: reservedInstancesOfferingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Reserved Instance offering to add. For more information, see DescribeReservedInstancesOfferings.

nested_items.name: instanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances to add for this Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: addSavingsPlanAction
nested_items.description: Action to add a Savings Plan to the scenario.

nested_items.name: savingsPlanOfferingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Savings Plan offering to add. For more information, see DescribeSavingsPlansOfferings.

nested_items.name: commitment
nested_items.description: The hourly commitment, in the same currency of the savingsPlanOfferingId. This is a value between 0.001 and 1 million. You cannot specify more than five digits after the decimal point.

nested_items.name: negateReservedInstanceAction
nested_items.description: Action to remove a Reserved Instance from the scenario.

nested_items.name: reservedInstancesId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Reserved Instance to remove.

nested_items.name: negateSavingsPlanAction
nested_items.description: Action to remove a Savings Plan from the scenario.

nested_items.name: savingsPlanId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Savings Plan to remove.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: Returns the list of errors reason and the commitment item keys that cannot be created in the Bill Scenario.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the entry that caused the error.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: A descriptive message for the error that occurred.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the failed operation.
